title: About Us
intro:
## Hello!

At CatBlog, our writers and staff are hard at work providing you with the latest content about cats, our furry feline friends! We strive to make sure our content achieves the highest quality in the following standards.

1. Quality
2. Excellence
3. Originality

Thus, we always have scientists on the clock 24/7 researching the latest cat trends and changes to make sure we are providing you the most up to date, latest content that is available! We want to make sure that you are reading the best articles about cats that are out there!

![](/img/giphy.gif)

#### Thank you for visiting our website!
